plugin.name: üåê NotePlan Online
plugin.description: Allows you to make your NotePlan note to be securely sharable via password-protected link (like NotePlan Publish but somewhat better).
plugin.author: Anton Skliar

plugin.commands.name: publish
plugin.commands.description: Publishes current note to NotePlan Online and inserts published page URL into then note

plugin.commands.name: unpublish
plugin.commands.description: Removes the published version of the note from the server and destroys the secret link

plugin.settings.title: Text of the link
plugin.settings.description: Text of the NotePlan Online link that will be inserted into the note after publishing

plugin.settings.title: Password for published notes (32 characters long)
plugin.settings.description: Your password is used to encrypt your notes before publishing as well as to open those notes at noteplan.online

plugin.settings.title: Append the password to the URL inserted into the note
plugin.settings.description: If you enable this option, the secret to decrypt the note on the server will be appended to the note URL so that you do not have to enter the password manually. This is more convenient but less secure.

plugin.settings.title: Access key for updating and unpublishing notes
plugin.settings.description: Your secret key that is used to update or delete published notes from noteplan.online
